context.expression: (user.role === 'hts_provider' || user.role === 'clinician') && contact.patient_birthDate && summary.contactAgeInMonths >= 18 && contact.contact_type === 'universal_client' && contact.record_purpose !== 'treatment_verification' && !summary.screenedToday && contact.record_purpose !== 'linkage' && (summary.hts_retest_latest.final_result !== '_703_positive_99DCT')
